Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: New stable release 1.3.0 is published. Against 1.1.0 it includes call for ledgerless DID support and option to encrypt default wallet.

Action.author: sergey.minaev
Action.body: ~krw910 please verify that current functionality is enough for all teams.

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: The teams have informed me the wallet encryption is present and they have integrated it.
